text: omaha , nebraska a united airlines plane made an emergency landing in omaha on wednesday night after the crew discovered a fuel leak , an airport spokesman said . flight 788 was en route from san francisco to boston when it was forced to divert to eppley airfield with a fuel leak in the right engine , said joe rotterdam , an operation supervisor for the airport . the aircraft landed safely at 8:20 p.m. ct. . united was bringing in another plane to fly the passengers to boston , rotterdam said . cnn 's marlena baldacci contributed to this report .
summary: a fuel leak forces the plane to land in omaha .   flight 788 is en route from san francisco to boston .
